summary: A boy with five fathers who is attached to the criminal underworld. A sinister past is about to be revealed as he is forced to join the killing spree.
cast: Yoon-seok Kim|Jin-gu Yeo|Jin-woong Cho|Hyun-Sung Jang|Seong-gyoon Kim|Hae-Joon Park|Nam Ji-Hyun|Ji-Eun Lim|Yeon-Seok Yoo|Seong-kun Mun|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Cheol-woo Han|Joo-wan Han|Jang In-sub|Yoon-Seok Jung|Bok-gi Min|Yong-woo Park|Young-hwa Seo|Do-Hyun Sung|Jung-kook Woo|Kim Young-Min
keywords: psychotronic film|criminal|gun|locked in a basement|forced to kill
title: Hwayi: Gwimuleul samkin ai
